meta_description: The mission of the Blaffer Art Museum is to create experiences with contemporary art and artists that ignite wonder. Always FREE.
hours_text:
# Hours & Admission / Directions & Parking / Visitor Tips / Tours & Group Visits

* * *

# Admission is always FREE!

* * *

[__Exhibitions](/web/20250809192436/https://blafferartmuseum.org/exhibitions)[ __Upcoming Events](/web/20250809192436/https://blafferartmuseum.org/upcoming-events)[ __Book a Tour](/web/20250809192436/https://blafferartmuseum.org/form_tour_request_short/)

## Hours & Admission

* * *

[infoblaffer@uh.edu](http://web.archive.org/web/20250809192436/mailto:infoblaffer@uh.edu)

* * *

[713-743-9521](tel:7137439521)

Museum Hours:  
Tuesday–Friday, 12:00pm–5:00pm  
Saturday–Monday, Closed****

The Blaffer observes the [University of Houston holiday schedule](http://web.archive.org/web/20250809192436/https://www.uh.edu/human-resources/payroll/holiday-schedule/) and other university closures. Additionally, we are sometimes closed for installation between exhibitions.

**Admission is always free.**

* * *

## Directions & Parking

* * *

[__Open in Maps](http://web.archive.org/web/20250809192436/https://www.google.com/maps/place/Blaffer+Art+Museum/@29.724937,-95.342436,14z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xeb4ddbc8284f3156!8m2!3d29.724937!4d-95.3424358?hl=en)

collections_text:
×

❄ **Winter Hours at the Blaffer** ❄

**_Closed to the Public_** from December 22, 2025-January 9, 2026  
Normal operating hours resume **Saturday, January 10 at 12pm** for the opening of [_The Uncanny In-Between_](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106225941/https://blafferartmuseum.org/uncanny-in-between/).

Current & Upcoming Exhibitions

[ __View All](/web/20260106225941/https://blafferartmuseum.org/exhibitions)

* * *
